home.title: Truth Or Dare
home.subtitle: Choose the category that you want to play
game.title: It's {player}!
game.consent.title: Consent warning
game.consent.description: During the whole game you have to respect all players consent. You're not forced to do any challenges, and you can skip if you want to! Play safe to have the best time together! Have a good game :)
game.quit.title: Leave the game?
game.quit.content: Leaving the game now will remove all players and reset challenges, are you sure that you want to continue?
game.no_challenge.title: No challenge found
game.no_challenge.content: After multiple attempts, no suitable challenge have been found, the best solution for that issue is to restart a game. If it occurs again please contact us!
add_player.title: Add a player
add_player.name: Name
player_selection.title: Select the players
category.friends.name: Friends
category.friends.description: Just for fun with your friends
category.couples.name: Couples
category.couples.description: For couples who want to know each other better
category.family.name: Family
category.chill.name: Chill
category.chill.description: For those who want to relax
category.hot.name: Hot
category.hot.description: For those who want to spice things up
category.extreme.name: Extreme
category.extreme.description: For those who are not afraid of anything
category.custom.name: Custom
settings.title: Settings
settings.language.description: Choose the language of the application
custom_challenges.title: Custom challenges
custom_challenge.delete.title: Delete challenge
custom_challenge.delete.content: Are you sure that you want to delete the selected challenges (this action cannot be undone)?
custom_challenge.export_error: An error occurred while exporting the challenges
custom_challenge.export_success: The challenges have been exported successfully
custom_challenge.import_error: An error occurred while importing the challenges
custom_challenge.import_success: The challenges have been imported successfully
custom_challenge.import_warning.title: Challenge(s) conflict
custom_challenge.import_warning.content: Some challenge identifiers are already used, do you want to replace them?
add_challenge.title: Add a challenge
about.title: About
about.description: This application was created by Vortezz and is open-source. You can find the source code by clicking on the button below. The terms of use and privacy policy are available by clicking on the links below and are the same as the vortezz.dev website. Finally you can suggest new challenges by clicking on the Plus below!
